name: EduMe
slogan: EduMe is the world's leading platform for Workforce Success
description:
EduMe is used by modern companies across 6 continents to train, engage and communicate with their workforce. By having effective learning and relevant information in the palm of their hands, the workforce at companies like Uber, Airbnb, Deloitte and Vodafone are empowered to perform at their best.

EduMe is a hyper-growth company based in London, UK.

team.name: Jacob Waern
team.bioHtml: Founder @EduMe • Worked at @Rocket Internet, @Groupon

jobs.title: Full-stack developer
jobs.description:
EduMe is a Workforce Success platform used by modern companies across 6 continents to train, engage and communicate with their workforce. By having effective learning and relevant information in the palm of their hands, the workforce at companies like Uber, Airbnb and Vodafone are empowered to perform at their best.

EduMe is a hyper-growth company based in London, UK.

As a Developer at EduMe you'll be working alongside our team of 5 developers. We use Javascript for the majority of our codebase: Node on the backend, React and Redux on the frontend and React Native for our apps. Generally you'll work on features the whole way through, writing backend and frontend code. You'll be able to contribute ideas about how we grow our tech stack and develop the architecture of our system. We get together to discuss when we have difficult problems to solve and we share when we learn things.

An ideal candidate will have:
- Strong engineering & problem solving skills
- Experience with Node, React & Redux
- Experience writing well-tested code
- Great communication skills
- Experience working in agile teams

Bonus skills and experience are:
- Experience scaling and dealing with performance challenges
- Experience delivering high quality React Native features
- Experience mentoring junior team members

What can you expect at edume
- A positive environment
- Awesome colleagues
- New laptop
- Learning time every Friday afternoon
- A modern office in leafy Chiswick with a great canteen at the Barley Mow Centre
- 25 days holiday
- Personal health budget
- Personal learning budget
- Friday drinks at our local pub The Lamb, opposite the office
- Regular team lunches and trips to the local ice cream shop
